verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> that were <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> had also <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G1209><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was come up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> that were of <S%G1537><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%> contended <S%G1252><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>
saying, <S%G3004><s%> Thou wentest in <S%G1525><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> men <S%G435><s%> uncircumcised, <S%G203><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> didst eat with <S%G4906><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> rehearsed the matter from the beginning, <S%G756><s%> and expounded <S%G1620><s%> it by order <S%G2517><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> was <S%G2252><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> of Joppa <S%G2445><s%> praying: <S%G4336><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a trance <S%G1611><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a vision, <S%G3705><s%> A certain <S%G5100><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%> descend, <S%G2597><s%> as it had been <S%G5613><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> sheet, <S%G3607><s%> let down <S%G2524><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> by four <S%G5064><s%> corners; <S%G746><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it came <S%G2064><s%> even to <S%G891><s%> me: <S%G1700><s%>

Upon <S%G1519><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> when I had fastened mine eyes, <S%G816><s%> I considered, <S%G2657><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> fourfooted beasts <S%G5074><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wild beasts, <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> creeping things, <S%G2062><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> air. <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto me, <S%G3427><s%> Arise, <S%G450><s%> Peter; <S%G4074><s%> slay <S%G2380><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> eat. <S%G5315><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I said, <S%G2036><s%> Not so, <S%G3365><s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> nothing <S%G3956><s%> common <S%G2839><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> hath at any time <S%G3763><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> again <S%G1537><s%> <S%G1208><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath cleansed, <S%G2511><s%> that call not thou common. <S%G2840><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4771><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> was done <S%G1096><s%> three times: <S%G5151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G537><s%> were drawn up <S%G385><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> immediately <S%G1824><s%> there were three <S%G5140><s%> men <S%G435><s%> already come <S%G2186><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> where <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I was, <S%G2252><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> bade <S%G2036><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> go with <S%G4905><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> doubting. <S%G1252><s%> Moreover <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> <S%G2532><s%> accompanied <S%G2064><s%> <S%G4862><s%> me, <S%G1698><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> man's <S%G435><s%> house: <S%G3624><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> he showed <S%G518><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he had seen <S%G1492><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> which stood <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Send <S%G649><s%> men <S%G435><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Joppa, <S%G2445><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> call for <S%G3343><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> whose surname is <S%G1941><s%> Peter; <S%G4074><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall tell <S%G2980><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> words, <S%G4487><s%> whereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as I <S%G3165><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the beginning. <S%G746><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> remembered <S%G3415><s%> I the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> that he said, <S%G3004><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> with water; <S%G5204><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> shall be baptized <S%G907><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

Forasmuch <S%G1487><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> as God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> like <S%G2470><s%> gift <S%G1431><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> he did <S%G2532><s%> unto us, <S%G2254><s%> who believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> was <S%G2252><s%> I, that I could <S%G1415><s%> withstand <S%G2967><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> they heard <S%G191><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> they held their peace, <S%G2270><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Then <S%G686><s%> hath <S%G1065><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> granted <S%G1325><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

Now <S%G3767><s%> they which were scattered abroad <S%G1289><s%> <S%G3303><s%> upon <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> persecution <S%G2347><s%> that arose <S%G1096><s%> about <S%G1909><s%> Stephen <S%G4736><s%> traveled <S%G1330><s%> as far as <S%G2193><s%> Phoenicia, <S%G5403><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Cyprus, <S%G2954><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%> preaching <S%G2980><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> to none <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> unto the Jews <S%G2453><s%> only. <S%G3440><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> men <S%G435><s%> of Cyprus <S%G2953><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Cyrene, <S%G2956><s%> which, <S%G3748><s%> when they were come <S%G1525><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Grecians, <S%G1675><s%> preaching <S%G2097><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the hand <S%G5495><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> number <S%G706><s%> believed, <S%G4100><s%> and turned <S%G1994><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> tidings of these things came <S%G3056><s%> <S%G4012><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G191><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem: <S%G2414><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they sent forth <S%G1821><s%> Barnabas, <S%G921><s%> that he should go <S%G1330><s%> as far as <S%G2193><s%> Antioch. <S%G490><s%>

Who, <S%G3739><s%> when he came, <S%G3854><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> had seen <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> was glad, <S%G5463><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> exhorted <S%G3870><s%> them all, <S%G3956><s%> that with purpose <S%G4286><s%> of heart <S%G2588><s%> they would cleave unto <S%G4357><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> a good <S%G18><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of faith: <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> was added <S%G4369><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> departed <S%G1831><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Tarsus, <S%G5019><s%> for to seek <S%G327><s%> Saul: <S%G4569><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had found <S%G2147><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> he brought <S%G71><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Antioch. <S%G490><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass, <S%G1096><s%> that a whole <S%G3650><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> they <S%G846><s%> assembled themselves <S%G4863><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church, <S%G1577><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people. <S%G3793><s%> And <S%G5037><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> were called <S%G5537><s%> Christians <S%G5546><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Antioch. <S%G490><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G5025><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> came <S%G2718><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Antioch. <S%G490><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there stood up <S%G450><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Agabus, <S%G13><s%> and signified <S%G4591><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> that there should <S%G3195><s%> be <S%G1510><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> dearth <S%G3042><s%> throughout <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world: <S%G3625><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> <S%G2532><s%> came to pass <S%G1096><s%> in the days of <S%G1909><s%> Claudius <S%G2804><s%> Caesar. <S%G2541><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> according to <S%G2531><s%> his ability, <S%G5100><s%> <S%G2141><s%> determined <S%G3724><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> relief <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1248><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> which dwelt <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Judea: <S%G2449><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> they did, <S%G4160><s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> it to <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the hands <S%G5495><s%> of Barnabas <S%G921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Saul. <S%G4569><s%>
